children.value:
Greenacre Stud and Equestrian Centre is situated in the beautiful city of County Donegal. Private and group lessons are provided for horse riding to both the starters and advanced riders. The lesson schedule here includes breaking, schooling, sales prep-breaking, pony stallions at the pony camps held here. Show jumping leagues are also a major characteristic of this place.

Opening Time: Open all year (Monday to Saturday)

Admission Charge: €15 (Children)

€12 (Students)
